bibl.title: A Delayed Money Transfer. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Edition of a fragmentary Greek letter from the first or second century CE [Oxyrhynchus?] in which a priest of Thoëris instructs the addressee to go after a money order (ἐπιθήκη). - Text. - Priest of Thoëris. - Epitheke. - Interpretation.
bibl.seg: CONCANNON Cavan, A Delayed Money Transfer. Avec résumé en anglais.

Edition of a fragmentary Greek letter from the first or second century CE [Oxyrhynchus?] in which a priest of Thoëris instructs the addressee to go after a money order (ἐπιθήκη). - Text. - Priest of Thoëris. - Epitheke. - Interpretation.
